definition: to blow/to play a wind instrument/to blast/to puff/to boast/to brag/to end in failure/to fall through
scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack

sentences.english: The wind shall blow my top-knot off.
Dispersal of seeds, fruits, or other plant parts by wind.
sentences.chinese: 植物的种子，果实，或其它部分被风吹散。

sentences.english: But I scattered them with a whirlwind among all the nations whom they knew not.
sentences.chinese: 我必以旋风吹散他们到素不认识的万国中。

sentences.english: I wrote your name in the sky, but the wind blew it away.
sentences.chinese: 我把你的名字写在蓝天，可风却把它吹散。

sentences.english: The wind soon dispelled the fog.
The high tide will erase my foot-prints. And the wind will blow away the foam.
sentences.chinese: 高涨的潮水将抹去我的足迹，风也会把泡沫吹散。

sentences.english: When love comes, flowers bloom. When it's gone, wind blows them away.
sentences.chinese: 爱情来时花开遍，爱情去时风吹散。

sentences.english: After a brisk morning wind dissipater the clouds, the sky was clear all day.
sentences.chinese: 一阵凛冽的晨风吹散了这些云，一天的天气都很好。

sentences.english: Are you particulars dispelled by sea breeze?
sentences.chinese: 是一些被海风吹散的细节？

sentences.english: The wind shifted and blew the mist away.
Those bygone days have been dispersed as smoke by a light wind.
sentences.chinese: 过去的日子如轻烟，被微风吹散了。

sentences.english: But are like chaff that the wind drives away.
Several pages were torn away by the strong wind, the air of the liberty.
sentences.chinese: 急风已将撕碎了的信吹散，这是自由的空气。

sentences.english: He blew the leaves and away they flew.
Blown soil mounded on the window sill .
sentences.chinese: 吹散的尘土堆积在窗台上。

definition: to drift/to wave/to float on the waves/to flutter in the wind
lit. to fill the whole sky/everywhere/as far as the eye can see
(of a breeze) to make (hair, leaves, clothing etc) sway gently/to ruffle
to roll up/to curl up/(of dust etc) to swirl up
variant of 捲起|卷起[juan3 qi3]
to blow/to play a wind instrument/to blast/to puff/to boast/to brag/to end in failure/to fall through
to pervade/to fill the air/diffuse/everywhere present/about to inundate (water)/permeated by (smoke)/filled with (dust)/to saturate (the air with fog, smoke etc)
variant of 彌漫|弥漫[mi2 man4]
